name: Just Survive
description:
The world is looking for a new hero!

Just Survive is an indie-action game in which all the tactics of a real soldier are applied. Parachuting will seem like a normal thing to you the more often you do it. Your mission is to clear the area of enemies and turn it into a peaceful one.

Act as quickly as possible because the chopper is waiting for you to fly to another conflict zone. Ready ?

Game Features :
- Multiple missions
- Driving Skills
- Limited ammo & life
